column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Been here a couple times mainly for the good vibes and the sangria + tapas combination (their pomogranate sangria is so refreshing!) Make sure to ask your servers about the portion for each dish
column2: since sometimes 3-4 can be filling for one person
column3: but sometimes 2 is enough. Their paella
column5: and spicy potatoes are my favorite dinner dishes
column6: and most items from the brunch menus are delicious. Dessert-wise; the butterscotch custard probably stands out the most. The chocolate truffle cake is also good
column8: and the pomegranate sorbet was waaay too sour. However
column9: it's a great place to hang out and have good conversations over a wide variety of dishes and sangria (plus the good service) so I'll be back again!
